Data.description: Account registration is free and very straightforward. Just create an account with your email

Data.description: You can do this for each trip you’ll be taking to Japan, if you’re planning to go more than once.

Data.title: What is Visit Japan Web
Data.description: Visit Japan Web is Japan’s online service for immigration procedures and customs declarations,
